about_team: Two passionate students from Kristianstad University and Inholland University. Creators of
add_team_members_desc: Add new invitees to the list. They can later join your team using selective join link down below
card_style_desc: Choose the default card style for the task board
change_pass_desc: Update your credentials associated with this account
clear_col_dialog_desc: You are going to delete all tasks in this column
collaborative_task_discussions_desc: Engage your team directly on each task with threads and comments, making communication effortless and context-rich.
cookies_banner: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website
custom_dashboard_calendar_desc: Visualize progress, deadlines, and priorities with a fully customizable dashboard and calendar view tailored to your workflow.
delete_members_dialog_desc: You are going to delete selected users from the team
delete_profile_desc: Delete your account and all content related to it
delete_tag_warning: Deleting a tag will reassign all tasks with that tag to "No Tag"
delete_task_dialog_desc: You are going to delete the task
delete_team_desc: When you delete a team you delete all content related to it. No content recovery option is available, be careful
demo_mode_desc: In demo mode, you can explore all of Collabra’s features — including private pages — with full visibility. The only limitation is that changes are disabled, offering a view-only experience
everything_for_collaboration_desc: Use our flexible tools to make your team workflow as precise as it needs to be
general_info_desc: This info is accessible by everyone in the team. It is also seen in the invitation box for new members
hero_title: Collaboration tool to make working in a team easier
leave_team_desc: To join again you will need a new invitation
login_to_access: This page can be seen only by authorized users
logout_desc: This will end current session and you will need to sign in again
manage_invitations_desc: Add users to waiting list so that they can join your team later. Public link allows everyone to go in. Refresh it at any time if you lost a link or it was compromised by unauthorized people
manage_members_desc: Change members' roles or remove them from the team. Please note that roles and permissions get updated immediately but users' interface doesn't change until the next website reload
member_status_hint: Custom label only for this team
no_invited_users: You have not invited any users yet
no_tasks_created: No tasks found with given filter. Maybe try adding tasks or clear filters?
no_teams_created: You have not created or joined any teams yet
not_found_desc: Please check the address you entered is correct or try again later.
personal_info_desc: This information is visible to all users in your teams
settings_are_global: View settings are global and will be applied to all teams
smart_task_tracking_desc: Create tasks with statuses, subtasks, review toggles, and deadlines to keep your projects organized and on track.
subtasks_desc: Use subtasks to break down a task into smaller steps
tasks_order_desc: Select in which order you want to sort tasks in each column in the task board
team_members_management_desc: Change roles and permissions for each individual user. Make custom invitations and more!
team_tags_desc: Manage tasks' tags and use them later when creating new tasks. These tags are only available in this team.
title: Title
to_tag_settings: To add, edit or delete tags go to the team's settings page
view_profile: Look how others see my profile
